entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 1.
